titles: The queen of the milk-women; or, An elegy occasion'd by the death of Mrs. E. G. Who departed this life on Thursday morning October 6th. 1698. As allso a fuil account how she lies in state, and threescore milk-women in mourning for her.
notes: Imperfect: faded, with much loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Elegiac poetry, English --  Scotland --  Early works to 1800.
